links.name: Don't miss my valuable posts on LinkedIn
I create helpful content-rich threads on Twitter

milestones.title: Started Learning C++
milestones.description: I got interested in programming and started learning C++, but I stopped it after 2 months.

milestones.title: Started Learning Web development
milestones.description: I started learning web development from HTML,CSS and JS to MERN stack within 1.5 months and I found it joyful.

milestones.title: Secured 4th in CodePeak IITGxIITP
milestones.description: A month-long open-source competition organized by Coding club IIT Guwahati and NWOC IIT Patna. Contributed to over 10+ projects

milestones.title: Started Practising DSA seriously
milestones.description: I have learnt C++ before but I took long break from it and DSA. I have decided to consistently practice DSA and solve as many good problems as I can

milestones.title: Took Part in HacktoberFest
milestones.description: Participated in Hacktoberfest for the first time

milestones.title: Got Summer Intern at Razorpay
milestones.description: All that hardwork paid off. After getting shortlisted for many companies I got my first intern at Razorpay

milestones.title: Social Media
milestones.description: I am trying to be active on my Twitter and LinkedIn profiles by providing valuable quality-rich useful content and sharing my learnings in form of posts, tweets and threads. Hence Do follow me on both Twitter and LinkedIn

milestones.title: Joined Clueless as Mentor, Web Developer and Core Team Member
milestones.description: Clueless is a student-driven development community built with the vision to make everyone fall in love with Open-source
